}

Edit Student

First name @if (stdForm.get('first')?.hasError('required')) { First name is required }
Last name
Roll No
Gender Male Female Other @if (stdForm.get('gender')?.hasError('required')) { Gender is required }
Email @if (stdForm.get('email')?.hasError('email') && stdForm.get('email')?.touched) { Please enter a valid email address }
Mobile
Registration Date @if (stdForm.get('rDate')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Select Department Mechanical Science Mathematics Computer Civil @if (stdForm.get('department')?.hasError('required')) { Select Any Department }
Parents name @if (stdForm.get('parentName')?.hasError('required')) { Parents name is required }
Parents Mobile Number
Date Of Birth @if (stdForm.get('dob')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Blood Group
Address
